sentences.sContent: “We’re the first to cultivate this bee and the first to provide as much evidence of its potential as a red raspberry and blackberry pollinator,” says Cane.
sentences.sCn: 凯恩说：“我们是第一个养殖这种蜂的，也是第一个为红莓和黑霉传粉昆虫提供最多可能性证据的。”

trans.tranOther: A pollinator is something that pollinates plants, especially a type of insect.
